title: Cummings Condemnation (with Carla Lockhart MP)
itunes:title: Cummings Condemnation (with Carla Lockhart MP)
description:
Dominic Cummings, the Prime Minister's former aide, delivers forensic analysis of Boris Johnson's failures in the early days of the pandemic but apologises for his part in getting it so wrong. Bloomberg Opinion Columnist Therese Raphael says it is one thing to read the script, another to hear the blow-by-blow account, even if the PM is in no real political danger now.


DUP MP Carla Lockhart says that the criticism will all 'come out in the wash'. Speaking to Bloomberg Westminster's Caroline Hepker and Roger Hearing, she adds that the Democratic Unionist Party is a progressive party despite their stance against abortion and same-sex marriage.

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
